content.en: Distributed adaptive algorithms: Researchers have been exploring how distributed adaptive algorithms can be used in various applications such as signal estimation, speech enhancement, and active noise control in sensor networks. These algorithms have the ability to reduce communication bandwidth and computational load, enable adaptation during speech-absent time segments, achieve the same performance as centralized methods without communication constraints, and even outperform previously reported algorithms. By leveraging the power of distributed networks, these algorithms offer promising solutions for improving the efficiency and performance of wireless acoustic sensor networks.
content.da: Distribuerede adaptive algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan distribuerede adaptive algoritmer kan anvendes i forskellige applikationer såsom signalestimation, tale-forbedring og aktiv støjkontrol i sensornetværk. Disse algoritmer har evnen til at reducere kommunikationsbåndbredde og beregningsbelastning, muliggøre tilpasning under tidssegmenter uden tale, opnå samme ydeevne som centraliserede metoder uden kommunikationsbegrænsninger og endda overgå tidligere rapporterede algoritmer. Ved at udnytte styrken af distribuerede netværk, tilbyder disse algoritmer lovende løsninger til at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af trådløse akustiske sensornetværk.
